column4: everytime i go on the terminal and i try to install and get to the point where i have to type in the password it does not allow me to type in anything
all i can do is press enter
u mean as simple as that
nothing seems to be displayed the cursor doesn't even move when i type
but only the enter key seems to work
i will try so the command should be sudo -l then when prompted for password i just type it
but i cant even c the *
so that people looking over your shoulder cant tell how long the password is
if your willing to listen and do some research, were always happy to help
could you please run 'lsusb' and paste the output on paste.ubuntu.com
no, paste to the site   paste.ubuntu.com
cool, when you submit it, it will change the URL, we need that new URL to see the paste
now, paste the new link in the channel

It just helps us by showing us info from your system, and doesnt flood the channel in the process. Now, there seems to be a bug with your tuner card, so make sure its in the system before ubuntu boots, then you need to look into something like MythTV
